summary.span: Represents an object that is taking part in a scope hierarchy.

span.span: Represents an object that is taking part in a scope hierarchy.

summary.span: This class contains methods for resolving scope and for getting member information.

span.span: This class contains methods for resolving scope and for getting member information.

summary.span: It belongs to the compilation and run-time state category.

span.span: It belongs to the compilation and run-time state category.

summary.span: Gets the current default scope, which is either the contained object of a statement scope, or the global scope.

param.span: The name of the field to search for.

summary.span: Returns a field that has the specified name by searching the scope hierarchy.

span.span: Returns a field that has the specified name by searching the scope hierarchy.

summary.span: This method searches only the scope that is specified by the lexical level.

span.span: This method searches only the scope that is specified by the lexical level.

returns.span: A object that has the specified name.

span.span: A object that has the specified name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Этот метод применим к полям, которые не удается разрешить во время компиляции.This method applies to fields that cannot be resolved at compile time. Это происходит, когда `eval` выражение ссылается на поле во внешней области.This occurs when an `eval` expression refers to a field in the outer scope. Поскольку `eval` выражение может объявить локальное поле с тем же именем, что поле во внешней области, поле не может быть раннее связывание с внешней области поля.Because the `eval` expression can declare a local field that has the same name as a field in the outer scope, the field cannot be early bound to the outer scope field.

summary.span: Gets the global scope by searching the scope hierarchy until it finds a scope that includes static variables, for example, a module scope.

span.span: Gets the global scope by searching the scope hierarchy until it finds a scope that includes static variables, for example, a module scope.
The global scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Этот метод применяется к элементам, которые не удается разрешить во время компиляции.This method applies to members that cannot be resolved at compile time. Это происходит, когда `eval` выражение ссылается на член во внешней области.This occurs when an `eval` expression refers to a member in the outer scope. Поскольку `eval` выражение может объявить локальный член, имеющий имя, совпадающее с именем члена во внешней области, элемент не может быть раннее связывание с членом во внешней области.Because the `eval` expression can declare a local member that has the same name as a member in the outer scope, the member cannot be early bound to the outer scope member.
